---
name: Colors
menu: Theme
---

import { Playground, Props } from 'docz';
import styled from 'styled-components';

# Colors

These are the colors from the oslo color scheme that the designers use.

## Visual

### Dark Blue

<Playground>
  {() => {
    const DarkBlue = styled.div`
      width: 50px;
      height: 50px;
      border-radius: 50%;
      background-color: ${(props) => props.theme.colors.DarkBlue};
    `;
    return (
      <DarkBlue />
    )
  }}
</Playground>

### Blue

<Playground>
  {() => {
    const Blue = styled.div`
      width: 50px;
      height: 50px;
      border-radius: 50%;
      background-color: ${(props) => props.theme.colors.Blue};
    `;
    return (
      <Blue />
    )
  }}
</Playground>

### Light Blue

<Playground>
  {() => {
    const LightBlue = styled.div`
      width: 50px;
      height: 50px;
      border-radius: 50%;
      background-color: ${(props) => props.theme.colors.LightBlue};
    `;
    return (
